name: part_006
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】雪花ラミィ 2nd Anniversary Live!!! ＂Fleur＂【 #雪花ラミィ2周年LIVE  】 [2Qaek3gXDgg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Lamy finishes her emotional performance of 'Dry Flower' by Yuuri.
Lamy performs 'Hana ni Bourei' by Yorushika, featuring a change in stage atmosphere.

subtitles.original: 今も
subtitles.english: Even now

subtitles.original: 嫌いじゃないの
subtitles.english: I don't hate you

subtitles.original: ドライフラワーみたいに
subtitles.english: Just like a dried flower

subtitles.original: 時間が経てば
subtitles.english: As time goes by

subtitles.original: きっと きっと
subtitles.english: Surely, surely

subtitles.original: 色褪せる
subtitles.english: The colors will fade

subtitles.original: 月明かりに魔物が揺れる
subtitles.english: Monsters sway in the moonlight

subtitles.original: きっと私もどうかしている
subtitles.english: I must be going crazy, too

subtitles.original: 暗闇に色彩が浮かぶ
subtitles.english: Colors float in the darkness

subtitles.original: 赤いアイ色が胸の奥
subtitles.english: A deep red indigo in my heart

subtitles.original: ずっとあなたの名前を呼ぶ
subtitles.english: I'll always be calling your name

subtitles.original: 好きという気持ちまた香る
subtitles.english: The feeling of love wafts again

subtitles.original: 声も 顔も
subtitles.english: Your voice, your face

subtitles.original: 不器用なとこも
subtitles.english: And even your awkwardness

subtitles.original: 全部 全部
subtitles.english: Everything, everything

subtitles.original: 大嫌いだよ
subtitles.english: I hate it all

subtitles.original: まだ枯れない花を
subtitles.english: A flower that hasn't withered yet

subtitles.original: 君に添えてさ
subtitles.english: I'll place it beside you

subtitles.original: ずっと ずっと
subtitles.english: Forever and ever

subtitles.original: 抱えてよ
subtitles.english: Hold onto it

subtitles.original: 花に亡霊 / 作詞・作曲：n-buna
subtitles.english: Ghost in a Flower / Lyrics & Composition: n-buna

subtitles.original: もう忘れてしまったかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you've already forgotten

subtitles.original: 夏の木陰に座ったまま
subtitles.english: Sitting in the summer shade

subtitles.original: アイスを口に放り込んで
subtitles.english: Tossing an ice cream into my mouth

subtitles.original: 風を待っていた
subtitles.english: Waiting for the breeze

subtitles.original: もう忘れてしまったかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you've already forgotten

subtitles.original: 世の中の全部嘘だらけ
subtitles.english: Everything in the world is full of lies

subtitles.original: 本当の価値を二人で
subtitles.english: Let's go find the true value

subtitles.original: 探しに行こうと笑ったこと
subtitles.english: The two of us together, that's what we laughed about

subtitles.original: 忘れないように 色褪せないように
subtitles.english: So I don't forget, so it doesn't fade

subtitles.original: 形に残るものが全てじゃないように
subtitles.english: So that things left in physical form aren't everything

subtitles.original: 言葉をもっと教えて
subtitles.english: Tell me more words

subtitles.original: 夏が来るって教えて
subtitles.english: Tell me that summer is coming

subtitles.original: 僕は描いてる 眼に映ったのは夏の亡霊だ
subtitles.english: I'm drawing what I saw in my eyes was a summer ghost

subtitles.original: 風にスカートが揺れて
subtitles.english: My skirt sways in the wind

subtitles.original: 思い出なんて忘れて
subtitles.english: Forget all about the memories

subtitles.original: 浅い呼吸をする 汗を拭って夏めく
subtitles.english: Take shallow breaths, wipe away the sweat, and feel the summer

subtitles.original: もう忘れてしまったかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you've already forgotten

subtitles.original: 夏の木陰に座った頃
subtitles.english: The time we sat in the summer shade

subtitles.original: 遠くの丘から顔出した雲があったじゃないか
subtitles.english: There was a cloud peeking out from the distant hill, wasn't there?

subtitles.original: 君はそれを掴もうとして
subtitles.english: You tried to grab it

subtitles.original: 馬鹿みたいに空を切った手で
subtitles.english: With hands that cut through the empty air like an idiot

subtitles.original: 僕は紙に雲を一つ書いて 笑って握って見せて
subtitles.english: I drew a single cloud on paper, smiled, and showed it to you in my hand

subtitles.original: 忘れないように 色褪せないように
subtitles.english: So I don't forget, so it doesn't fade

subtitles.original: 歴史に残るものが全てじゃないから
subtitles.english: Because things left in history aren't everything

subtitles.original: 今だけ顔も無くして
subtitles.english: Lose your face just for now

subtitles.original: 言葉も全部忘れて
subtitles.english: Forget all the words, too

subtitles.original: 君は笑ってる 夏を待っている僕ら亡霊だ
subtitles.english: You're laughing, we're ghosts waiting for summer

subtitles.original: 心をもっと教えて
subtitles.english: Tell me more of your heart

subtitles.original: 夏の匂いを教えて
subtitles.english: Tell me the scent of summer

subtitles.original: 浅い呼吸をする
subtitles.english: Take shallow breaths

subtitles.original: 忘れないように 色褪せないように
subtitles.english: So I don't forget, so it doesn't fade

subtitles.original: 心に響くものが全てじゃないから
subtitles.english: Because things that resonate in the heart aren't everything
